title.narrative: Closing The Child Labor And Forced Labor Evidence Gap: Impact Evaluations

description.narrative: Impact Evaluations: Randomized control trial impact evaluations examining the effects of an information campaign on child labor in Peru.

title.narrative: Strengthening Unions to Promote Vulnerable Workers in Peru

description.narrative: Strengthen unions' capacity to organize and effectively represent vulnerable workers and improve union advocacy for vulnerable workers in labor rights enforcement and policy reform.

title.narrative: Office of Child Labor, Forced Labor, and Human Trafficking (OCFT) - Promoting Better Understanding of Indicators to Address Labor Trafficking in Peru

description.narrative: This project will help the Peruvian government and other labor stakeholders build their capacity to prevent, detect and eliminate forced labor and labor trafficking from workplaces in Peru. By bringing together the Ministry of Labor, regional and local governments, law enforcement officials and the judiciary branch, the project will encourage better enforcement through consultation and consensus-building.
